Uses of Package
org.flixel

Packages that use org.flixel
org.flixel   
org.flixel.data   
 

Classes in org.flixel used by org.flixel
FlxAnimationListener
           
FlxButton
          A simple button class that calls a function when clicked by the mouse.
FlxButtonListener
           
FlxEmitter
          FlxEmitter is a lightweight particle emitter.
FlxGame
          FlxGame is the heart of all flixel games, and contains a bunch of basic game loops and things.
FlxGameView
           
FlxGroup
          This is an organizational class that can update and render a bunch of FlxObjects.
FlxObject
          This is the base class for most of the display objects (FlxSprite, FlxText, etc).
FlxOverlapListener
           
FlxPoint
          Stores a 2D floating point coordinate.
FlxQuadTree
          A fairly generic quad tree structure for rapid overlap checks.
FlxRect
          Stores a rectangle.
FlxSound
          This is the universal flixel sound object, used for streaming, music, and sound effects.
FlxSprite
          The main "game object" class, handles basic physics and animation.
FlxState
          This is the basic game "state" object - e.g. in a simple game you might have a menu state and a play state.
FlxText
          Extends FlxSprite to support rendering text.
FlxTileblock
          This is the basic "environment object" class, used to create simple walls and floors.
FlxTilemap
          This is a traditional tilemap display and collision class.
FlxTrailMatchListener
